extendedInfo.description: If you are going to or from the Bangalore (Bengaluru) International Airport, this application will most likely serve all your transit needs. Contains information on state run transport bus (BIAS) schedules, fares, maps and more.You can also access inbound, outbound flight schedule of the day with live status of individual flights such as 'Boarding', 'Landed', 'Security', 'Final Call', 'Canceled' etc..Provides neatly organized list of contacts of airport authorities, facilities, airlines, taxi operations along with links to their phone numbers, websites and emails. Should you need, you may also launch your phones dialer, browser, or email application (by confirming when prompted) to communicate with the selected contact.This application requests the following permissions:INTERNET:  To show route maps and check for flight status.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION and ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION:  To show your relative position on the route map.CALL_PHONE:  To be able to request phone dialer to call the airlines or airport authorities from within the application. You will ALWAYS be prompted for confirmation before initiating call.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE:  To detect if network is available and issue message if not.The information on transport routes for this application was taken from a static source and eventually may go out of date. I will however endeavor to keep it current and updated.The application strives to be intuitive, easy and quick to use. Requests for new features or suggestions for improvement are welcome and appreciated. I hope you find it as useful as I do :-)

reviews.title: No nonsense app
reviews.comment: I just love the simplicity and usefulness of the ui. Also love the fact that it is offline considering I don\'t have a mobile data connection. If only maps were also offline. Good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Great app for Bangaloreans!! Perfect schedule of flights n buses!! Wonderful work! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not updated
reviews.comment: The new bus service BIA1 to Yeshwantpur is not shown
reviews.author: Mohit Agrawal

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Gud nice app easy to understand
reviews.author: Ravindra Nadh Chowdary K

reviews.title: No non-sense tool
reviews.comment: This is very helpful app. With all required info regarding BIAL
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic Application
reviews.comment: Excellent and very useful application. It shows all Arrival/Departure info and all Volvo Bus timings..+ Taxi/Airport Info. Great work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: its not Holistic
reviews.comment: Need features like looking at the map and finding bus routes through that. This is useful only when u know most of the things like which bus goes through which places. Suggest u to show information from a point on the map perspective.
reviews.author: umesh majhi
